item.title: What is XAI?
item.author: nuno@n9o.xyz (Blowfish)
item.description:
What is XAI?

XAI in Simple Language!

The discipline of Data Science and AI has introduced many terms into discussions that might seem complicated at first. In reality, many of these terms are intuitive and straightforward when considered from a natural intelligence perspective. However, from a technological standpoint, they can be complex. To understand XAI, letâ€™s explore a few examples.
